description:
~~~ Engaging, Interactive Educational game ~~~
~~~ 40+ realistic dinosaurs images, names and sounds  ~~~

Welcome to a one of a kind interactive, adaptive and fun memory game for children of all ages. Dino match contains a unique collection of over 40 amazing dinosaur images and sounds. The perfect way to engage children in a fun game while they learn about a broad range of dinosaurs from ancient times

 Tailor made and carefully designed by experienced educators to engage small children in a fun and educational game. A wonderful asset for any fun loving family with small children.

What’s inside:
> More than 40 unique dinosaurs 
> Numerous engaging levels in 2 different game modes. 
> Adaptive level system
> the game becomes more challenging as you pass more stages 
> Unique top to bottom mode
> for easy and intuitive understanding of the memory matching concepts
 > Shake to Shuffle
> and make the game so much more challenging 
> Store best time and best score for each level 
> High quality images and sounds 
> Display dinosaur name spelling and says dinosaur names 
> Light version comes with 2 full and free stages in each of the game layouts.   

Extra Features: 
~ Adaptive level system - This game provides an adaptive and unique level system. Allowing children to start at easy and simple levels, with just a few parts to remember, and progress to more advanced and challenging levels, helping you children gain confidence, improve concentration and increase memory skills as they pass the game stages.
~ Shake to Shuffle - Make your game more interesting and challenging, shake your device and the dinosaurs will shuffle on screen.  
~  Top to Bottom mode - Allow your small children the opportunity to enjoy the learning experience of a memory game, in a simple and straightforward approach specifically designed for children. Choose one dinosaur from the top row and one dinosaur from the bottom row to create a match. So simple and so much fun. 
~  Dinosaur spelling - As you play the game and make your matches, you'll see each dinosaur name spelled at the lower area of the screen, touch it to hear its name in a high quality narration voice.   

Note: First 2 levels are completely free in full. All other levels are available in a single in-app purchase inside the app. 

-NO SOUND? 
If the sound isn't working, make sure the mute switch is turned off, activate the application, then turn up the volume and the sound will work. 
(you can find the mute switch and volume button at the side of your iPad/iPhone/iPod Touch).

By downloading this application you agree to the Terms of Use of Kids Best Place. which are available to your review on http://kidsbestplace.com/terms-of-use/
